Also if anyone is looking for a vegan food writer for any projects, I would love to know as sometimes I feel like I’m shouting into an echo chamber with the blog.
I really want to keep writing but it’s just hard to find motivation sometimes when I’m accountable for everything.

I also still have a few recipes left to post but I’m going to shift the focus away from recipes for a while as they just take so long to test and get right.
Since there’s so much vegan food flourishing in Dublin atm I thought why not write about that?

I am struggling a bit with how to frame writing about gardening as I know so little about it without being like “I love gardening lol” but it’s nice to have a place to put that writing if ever I get to the bottom of it.

I updated my blog today as I wanted a space to put up some reviews of vegan places around town. I also am trying to build gardening in somehow. I'm not really sure where I'm headed with it but at least it looks pretty 👨‍🍳👨‍🌾https://t.co/WwtTBR3vUd
